## Overview

The following dependencies have been updated by [dependencies.io](https://www.dependencies.io/):

- `yarn.lock` was updated (including 5 updated direct dependencies)
- `react` in `package.json` from "^15.5.4" to "^16.2.0"
- `react-dom` in `package.json` from "^15.5.4" to "^16.2.0"
- `react-scripts` in `package.json` from "^0.9.5" to "^1.0.17"

## Details

### yarn.lock

180 transitive dependencies were updated, 9 were added, and 2 removed. View the git diff for more details about exactly what changed.

The following 5 direct dependencies were updated:

**prop-types was updated from 15.5.10 to 15.6.0**

<small>*We didn't find any content for 15.6.0. Feel free to open an issue at https://github.com/dependencies-io/support to suggest any improvements.*</small>

**react was updated from 15.6.0 to 15.6.2**

<small>*We didn't find any content for 15.6.2. Feel free to open an issue at https://github.com/dependencies-io/support to suggest any improvements.*</small>

**react-dom was updated from 15.6.0 to 15.6.2**

<small>*We didn't find any content for 15.6.2. Feel free to open an issue at https://github.com/dependencies-io/support to suggest any improvements.*</small>

**react-redux was updated from 5.0.5 to 5.0.6**

<small>*We didn't find any content for 5.0.6. Feel free to open an issue at https://github.com/dependencies-io/support to suggest any improvements.*</small>

**redux was updated from 3.6.0 to 3.7.2**

<small>*We didn't find any content for 3.7.2. Feel free to open an issue at https://github.com/dependencies-io/support to suggest any improvements.*</small>
